oracle.xdb.dom
Class XDBCharData

java.lang.Object
  oracle.xdb.dom.XDBNode
      oracle.xdb.dom.XDBCharData

All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterData, Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
XDBComment, XDBText

Deprecated. as of Oracle Database 11g release 1, use oracle.xml.parser.v2.CharData

public class XDBCharData
extends XDBNode
implements CharacterData

This class implements the W3C CharacterData interface
